c:complexType.name: LineExtensionPoint
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The class of protovis Line extension points.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: fillStyle
c:property.c:documentation:
The fill color of the line.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: strokeStyle
c:property.c:documentation:
The border stroke color of the line.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: lineWidth
c:property.c:documentation:
The width of the line.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: interpolate
c:property.c:documentation:
How to interpolate the line between values.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: tension
c:property.c:documentation:
The tension of cardinal splines,
See the associated protovis documentation at .
